cards.flavor: The harmony of the glorious is a dirge to the wicked.
cards.name: Angelic Chorus
cards.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain life equal to its toughness.

cards.name: Arcane Artisan
cards.text:
{2}{U}, {T}: Target player draws a card, then exiles a card from their hand. If a creature card is exiled this way, that player creates a token that's a copy of that card.
When Arcane Artisan leaves the battlefield, exile all tokens created with it at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.name: Archfiend of Despair
cards.text:
Flying
Your opponents can't gain life.
At the beginning of each end step, each opponent loses life equal to the life that player lost this turn. (Damage causes loss of life.)

cards.name: Archon of Valor's Reach
cards.text:
Flying, vigilance, trample
As Archon of Valor's Reach enters the battlefield, choose artifact, enchantment, instant, sorcery, or planeswalker.
Players can't cast spells of the chosen type.

cards.flavor: "I see something special in you—a bright ember that yearns to dance among the stars."
cards.name: Arena Rector
cards.text: When Arena Rector dies, you may exile it. If you do, search your library for a planeswalker card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: "Finally, a weapon the Boros can't confiscate!" —Juri, proprietor of the Juri Revue
cards.name: Auger Spree
cards.text: Target creature gets +4/-4 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: "Monsters dwell in every heart. We only think civilization tames them." ―Euphemia, Nexus watcher
cards.name: Beast Within
cards.text: Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

cards.name: Blaring Captain
cards.text:
Partner with Blaring Recruiter (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Blaring Recruiter into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)
Whenever Blaring Captain attacks, attacking Warriors get +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Blaring Recruiter
cards.text:
Partner with Blaring Captain (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Blaring Captain into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)
{2}{W}: Create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token.

cards.flavor: "Now everyone knows what you are."
cards.name: Boldwyr Intimidator
cards.text:
Cowards can't block Warriors.
{R}: Target creature becomes a Coward until end of turn.
{2}{R}: Target creature becomes a Warrior until end of turn.

cards.flavor: No pilgrimage to Valor's Reach is complete without a stroll through its celebrated shopping district.
cards.name: Bountiful Promenade
cards.text:
Bountiful Promenade enters the battlefield tapped unless you have two or more opponents.
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.

cards.flavor: "Within this grove, you belong to me."
cards.name: Bramble Sovereign
cards.text: Whenever another nontoken creature enters the battlefield, you may pay {1}{G}. If you do, that creature's controller creates a token that's a copy of that creature.

cards.name: Brightling
cards.text:
{W}: Brightling gains vigilance until end of turn.
{W}: Brightling gains lifelink until end of turn.
{W}: Return Brightling to its owner's hand.
{1}: Brightling gets +1/-1 or -1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Instructors at the Kasarna training grounds are capable healers in case their students fail to grasp the subtleties of combat.
cards.name: Centaur Healer
cards.text: When Centaur Healer enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

cards.name: Chain Lightning
cards.text: Chain Lightning deals 3 damage to any target. Then that player or that permanent's controller may pay {R}{R}. If the player does, they may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.

cards.name: Chakram Retriever
cards.text:
Partner with Chakram Slinger (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Chakram Slinger into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)
Whenever you cast a spell during your turn, untap target creature.

cards.name: Chakram Slinger
cards.text:
Partner with Chakram Retriever (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Chakram Retriever into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)
{R}, {T}: Chakram Slinger deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.

cards.flavor: Arena beasts are bred for flashiness and foul temper. An extra head addresses both requirements.
cards.name: Charging Binox
cards.text:
Assist (Another player can pay up to {7} of this spell's cost.)
Trample

cards.flavor: "Punch 'em, kick 'em, bite 'em, beat 'em! Burn 'em all and we'll defeat 'em!"
cards.name: Cheering Fanatic
cards.text: Whenever Cheering Fanatic attacks, choose a card name. Spells with the chosen name cost {1} less to cast this turn.

cards.flavor: One of the many reasons why open-air markets close at dusk.
cards.name: Daggerdrome Imp
cards.text:
Flying
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

cards.name: Diabolic Intent
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: There is only one fate left to those banished from the God-Pharaoh's city.
cards.name: Doomed Dissenter
cards.text: When Doomed Dissenter dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

cards.flavor: He vowed he would never rest until he reached his destination. He doesn't know how right he was.
cards.name: Doomed Traveler
cards.text: When Doomed Traveler dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

cards.name: Doubling Season
cards.text:
If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead.
If an effect would put one or more counters on a permanent you control, it puts twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.

cards.name: Dwarven Lightsmith
cards.text:
Assist (Another player can pay up to {5} of this spell's cost.)
When Dwarven Lightsmith enters the battlefield, creatures your team controls get +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Loyal to a fault, it anticipates its master's every need.
cards.name: Eager Construct
cards.text: When Eager Construct enters the battlefield, each player may scry 1. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

cards.name: Expedition Raptor
cards.text:
Flying
When Expedition Raptor enters the battlefield, support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.)

cards.flavor: "Pathetic! I've heard more noise in a monastery. Let me hear you, Valor's Reach!"
cards.name: Fan Favorite
cards.text:
Assist (Another player can pay up to {3} of this spell's cost.)
{2}: Fan Favorite gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.

cards.flavor: The true strength of nature is not the raging storm or the charging rhino, but the inexorable vitality of life.
cards.name: Fertile Ground
cards.text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of any color.

cards.flavor: A moment of distraction, a lifetime of regret.
cards.name: Fumble
cards.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Gain control of all Auras and Equipment that were attached to it, then attach them to another creature.

cards.flavor: Plan for victory, or prepare for defeat.
cards.name: Game Plan
cards.text:
Assist (Another player can pay up to {5} of this spell's cost.)
Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, then draws seven cards. Exile Game Plan.

cards.flavor: "Well, who do we have here, Gorm?" "No one, Virtus. No one at all."
cards.name: Gang Up
cards.text:
Assist (Another player can pay up to {X} of this spell's cost. You choose the value of X.)
Destroy target creature with power X or less.

cards.name: Generous Patron
cards.text:
When Generous Patron enters the battlefield, support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.)
Whenever you put one or more counters on a creature you don't control, draw a card.

cards.name: Gorm the Great
cards.text:
Partner with Virtus the Veiled (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Virtus into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)
Vigilance
Gorm the Great must be blocked if able, and Gorm must be blocked by two or more creatures if able.

cards.flavor: "There's wisdom to be gained in death—whether it be one's own or someone else's." —Jarad, Golgari Lich-Lord
cards.name: Greater Good
cards.text: Sacrifice a creature: Draw cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power, then discard three cards.

cards.name: Grothama, All-Devouring
cards.text:
Other creatures have "Whenever this creature attacks, you may have it fight Grothama, All-Devouring."
When Grothama leaves the battlefield, each player draws cards equal to the amount of damage dealt to Grothama this turn by sources they controlled.

cards.flavor: "Are you sure this is going to work?" asked Will. "No," said Rowan. "But if it does, it's going to be spectacular."
cards.name: Huddle Up
cards.text:
Assist (Another player can pay up to {2} of this spell's cost.)
Two target players each draw a card.

cards.name: Impetuous Protege
cards.text:
Partner with Proud Mentor (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Proud Mentor into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)
Whenever Impetuous Protege attacks, it gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the greatest power among tapped creatures your opponents control.

cards.flavor: "You call it luck. I call it preparation."
cards.name: Impulse
cards.text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.name: Inner Demon
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has flying, and is a Demon in addition to its other types.
When Inner Demon enters the battlefield, all non-Demon creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: The competition is but one aspect of the spectacle.
cards.name: Jubilant Mascot
cards.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay {3}{W}. If you do, support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.)

cards.flavor: She is adept at navigating the stadium's ever-changing landscape.
cards.name: Jungle Wayfinder
cards.text: When Jungle Wayfinder enters the battlefield, each player may search their library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into their hand, then shuffle their library.

cards.name: Khorvath Brightflame
cards.text:
Partner with Sylvia Brightspear (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Sylvia into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)
Flying, haste
Knights your team controls have flying and haste.

cards.name: Khorvath's Fury
cards.text: For each player, choose friend or foe. Each friend discards all cards from their hand, then draws that many cards plus one. Khorvath's Fury deals damage to each foe equal to the number of cards in their hand.

cards.flavor: She reaches beyond the physical realm, touching the ideals from which all creatures draw their power.
cards.name: Kor Spiritdancer
cards.text:
Kor Spiritdancer gets +2/+2 for each Aura attached to it.
Whenever you cast an Aura spell, you may draw a card.

cards.flavor: A spike and a maul are needed to crack their shells, but the taste is worth the effort.
cards.name: Kraken Hatchling
Krav, the Unredeemed
cards.text:
Partner with Regna, the Redeemer (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Regna into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)
{B}, Sacrifice X creatures: Target player draws X cards and gains X life. Put X +1/+1 counters on Krav, the Unredeemed.

cards.name: Land Tax
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: Some train all their lives for a shot at the title. Some just get really, really lucky.
cards.name: Last One Standing
cards.text: Choose a creature at random, then destroy the rest.

cards.name: Lava-Field Overlord
cards.text:
Assist (Another player can pay up to {7} of this spell's cost.)
Flying
When Lava-Field Overlord enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to target creature an opponent controls.

cards.name: Ley Weaver
cards.text:
Partner with Lore Weaver (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Lore Weaver into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)
{T}: Untap two target lands.

cards.name: Lore Weaver
cards.text:
Partner with Ley Weaver (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Ley Weaver into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)
{5}{U}{U}: Target player draws two cards.

cards.flavor: The view is rivaled only by the decadence of the decor.
cards.name: Luxury Suite
cards.text:
Luxury Suite enters the battlefield tapped unless you have two or more opponents.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

cards.flavor: "What would Urza think, I wonder, if he could hear how the nature mages still snarl at his name, but venerate the work of his apprentice?" —Teferi, to Jhoira
cards.name: Magus of the Candelabra
cards.text: {X}, {T}: Untap X target lands.

cards.flavor: "There will be no secrets between us... like it or not."
cards.name: Mindblade Render
cards.text: Whenever your opponents are dealt combat damage, if any of that damage was dealt by a Warrior, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

cards.flavor: Ancient magic reshapes the stage into a variety of landscapes.
cards.name: Morphic Pool
cards.text:
Morphic Pool enters the battlefield tapped unless you have two or more opponents.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

cards.name: Nirkana Revenant
cards.text:
Whenever you tap a Swamp for mana, add an additional {B}.
{B}: Nirkana Revenant gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Okaun, Eye of Chaos
cards.text:
Partner with Zndrsplt, Eye of Wisdom (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Zndrsplt into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)
At the beginning of combat on your turn, flip a coin until you lose a flip.
Whenever a player wins a coin flip, double Okaun's power and toughness until end of turn.

cards.flavor: The wardens watch for illegal tactics and protect spectators from the occasional rogue fireball.
cards.name: Out of Bounds
cards.text:
Assist (Another player can pay up to {3} of this spell's cost.)
Counter target spell.

cards.flavor: "Always a welcome sight breaking through the clouds." —Talrand, sky summoner
cards.name: Peregrine Drake
cards.text:
Flying
When Peregrine Drake enters the battlefield, untap up to five lands.

cards.name: Pir, Imaginative Rascal
cards.text:
Partner with Toothy, Imaginary Friend (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Toothy into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)
If one or more counters would be put on a permanent your team controls, that many plus one of each of those kinds of counters are put on that permanent instead.

cards.name: Pir's Whim
cards.text: For each player, choose friend or foe. Each friend searches their library for a land card, puts it on the battlefield tapped, then shuffles their library. Each foe sacrifices an artifact or enchantment they control.

cards.flavor: The most sensational plays send everyone home breathless.
cards.name: Play of the Game
cards.text:
Assist (Another player can pay up to {6} of this spell's cost.)
Exile all nonland permanents.

cards.flavor: "Get ready, son."
cards.name: Proud Mentor
cards.text:
Partner with Impetuous Protege (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Impetuous Protege into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)
{W}, {T}: Tap target creature.

cards.flavor: "Show them the light, my love." — Krav, the Unredeemed
cards.name: Regna's Sanction
cards.text: For each player, choose friend or foe. Each friend puts a +1/+1 counter on each creature they control. Each foe chooses one untapped creature they control, then taps the rest.

cards.name: Regna, the Redeemer
cards.text:
Partner with Krav, the Unredeemed (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Krav into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)
Flying
At the beginning of each end step, if your team gained life this turn, create two 1/1 white Warrior creature tokens.

cards.name: Rowan Kenrith
cards.text:
+2: During target player's next turn, each creature that player controls attacks if able. 
-2: Rowan Kenrith deals 3 damage to each tapped creature target player controls. 
-8: Target player gets an emblem with "Whenever you activate an ability that isn't a mana ability, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy."
Partner with Will Kenrith
Rowan Kenrith can be your commander.

cards.flavor: "I like a quick victory. More time to celebrate."
cards.name: Rushblade Commander
cards.text: Warriors your team controls have haste.

cards.flavor: Every attack is a test of your defenses. Every hit marks the map of your defeat.
cards.name: Saltwater Stalwart
cards.text: Whenever Saltwater Stalwart deals damage to an opponent, target player draws a card.

cards.flavor: Skybridges from across Kylem converge at the grand stadium of Valor's Reach.
cards.name: Sea of Clouds
cards.text:
Sea of Clouds enters the battlefield tapped unless you have two or more opponents.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.

cards.flavor: "Her voice is the wilderness, savage and pure." —Kamahl, druid acolyte
cards.name: Seedborn Muse
cards.text: Untap all permanents you control during each other player's untap step.

cards.flavor: The built-in obstacles force competitors to think three moves ahead.
cards.name: Sentinel Tower
cards.text: Whenever an instant or sorcery spell is cast during your turn, Sentinel Tower deals 1 damage to any target equal to 1 plus the number of instant and sorcery spells cast before that spell this turn.

cards.flavor: "Sea Gate may have fallen, but we still stand. We still fight." —Gideon Jura
cards.name: Shoulder to Shoulder
cards.text:
Support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.)
Draw a card.

cards.flavor: "I lead, destruction follows."
cards.name: Sickle Dancer
cards.text: Whenever Sickle Dancer attacks, if your team controls another Warrior, Sickle Dancer gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: The forest's constant struggle is to keep the spreading flowstone at bay.
cards.name: Skyshroud Claim
cards.text: Search your library for up to two Forest cards and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: Victories at Valor's Reach are broadcast via griffins in the sky above.
cards.name: Skystreamer
cards.text:
Assist (Another player can pay up to {4} of this spell's cost.)
Flying
When Skystreamer enters the battlefield, target player gains 4 life.

cards.flavor: Some spectators love an underdog, but others are just as happy to support a proven winner.
cards.name: Soaring Show-Off
cards.text:
Flying
When Soaring Show-Off enters the battlefield, each player draws a card.

cards.name: Soulblade Corrupter
cards.text:
Partner with Soulblade Renewer (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Soulblade Renewer into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)
Deathtouch
Whenever a creature with a +1/+1 counter on it attacks one of your opponents, that creature gains deathtouch until end of turn.

cards.name: Soulblade Renewer
cards.text:
Partner with Soulblade Corrupter (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Soulblade Corrupter into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)
When Soulblade Renewer enters the battlefield, support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.)

cards.flavor: One glamer leads him far from home. The next washes away his memory that home was ever anywhere but at her side.
cards.name: Sower of Temptation
cards.text:
Flying
When Sower of Temptation enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature for as long as Sower of Temptation remains on the battlefield.

cards.flavor: Mages and warriors recruited from across Kylem display their skills at Valor's Reach.
cards.name: Spellseeker
cards.text: When Spellseeker enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an instant or sorcery card with converted mana cost 2 or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: With practice, the measurement of magic can lead to its mastery.
cards.name: Spell Snare
cards.text: Counter target spell with converted mana cost 2.

cards.flavor: From thrilling combat to unparalleled vistas, Valor's Reach has it all.
cards.name: Spire Garden
cards.text:
Spire Garden enters the battlefield tapped unless you have two or more opponents.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.

cards.flavor: "Potions! Mana potions, health potions, energy potions—get your potions here!"
cards.name: Stadium Vendors
cards.text: When Stadium Vendors enters the battlefield, choose a player. That player adds two mana of any one color they choose.

cards.name: Stolen Strategy
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of each opponent's library. Until end of turn, you may cast nonland cards from among those exiled cards, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast those spells.

cards.flavor: The line between victory and defeat can be as slim as a razor's edge.
cards.name: Stunning Reversal
cards.text:
The next time you would lose the game this turn, instead draw seven cards and your life total becomes 1. 
Exile Stunning Reversal.

cards.flavor: The smallest seed of regret can bloom into redemption.
cards.name: Swords to Plowshares
cards.text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

cards.name: Sylvia Brightspear
cards.text:
Partner with Khorvath Brightflame (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Khorvath into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)
Double strike
Dragons your team controls have double strike.

cards.name: The Crowd Goes Wild
cards.text:
Assist (Another player can pay up to {X} of this spell's cost. You choose the value of X.)
Support X. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to X target creatures.)
Each creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains trample until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Some competitors fight for glory or money. Some just like hitting people.
cards.name: Thrasher Brute
cards.text: Whenever Thrasher Brute or another Warrior enters the battlefield under your team's control, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

cards.flavor: The stadium tests more than just fighting skill. For example, swimming ability.
cards.name: Tidespout Tyrant
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a spell, return target permanent to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Together Forever
cards.text:
When Together Forever enters the battlefield, support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.)
{1}: Choose target creature with a counter on it. When that creature dies this turn, return that card to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Toothy, Imaginary Friend
cards.text:
Partner with Pir, Imaginative Rascal (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Pir into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)
Whenever you draw a card, put a +1/+1 counter on Toothy, Imaginary Friend.
When Toothy leaves the battlefield, draw a card for each +1/+1 counter on it.

cards.name: True-Name Nemesis
cards.text:
As True-Name Nemesis enters the battlefield, choose a player.
True-Name Nemesis has protection from the chosen player. (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything controlled by that player.)

cards.name: Veteran Explorer
cards.text: When Veteran Explorer dies, each player may search their library for up to two basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield. Then each player who searched their library this way shuffles it.

cards.flavor: The favored noisemaker of goblins ever since the wardens cracked down on explosives.
cards.name: Victory Chimes
cards.text:
Untap Victory Chimes during each other player's untap step.
{T}: A player of your choice adds {C}.

cards.name: Vigor
cards.text:
Trample
If damage would be dealt to a creature you control other than Vigor, prevent that damage. Put a +1/+1 counter on that creature for each 1 damage prevented this way.
When Vigor is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

cards.flavor: Brutality had never been so exquisite.
cards.name: Virtus's Maneuver
cards.text: For each player, choose friend or foe. Each friend returns a creature card from their graveyard to their hand. Each foe sacrifices a creature they control.

cards.name: Virtus the Veiled
cards.text:
Partner with Gorm the Great (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Gorm into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)
Deathtouch
Whenever Virtus the Veiled deals combat damage to a player, that player loses half their life, rounded up.

cards.name: Will Kenrith
cards.text:
+2: Until your next turn, up to two target creatures each have base power and toughness 0/3 and lose all abilities.
-2: Target player draws two cards. Until your next turn, instant, sorcery, and planeswalker spells that player casts cost {2} less to cast.
-8: Target player gets an emblem with "Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy."
Partner with Rowan Kenrith
Will Kenrith can be your commander.

cards.name: Zndrsplt, Eye of Wisdom
cards.text:
Partner with Okaun, Eye of Chaos (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Okaun into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)
At the beginning of combat on your turn, flip a coin until you lose a flip.
Whenever a player wins a coin flip, draw a card.
